sentences.en: ...a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt.
sentences.cn: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

sentences.en: He peered at me like I'd just puked up on his jeans.
sentences.cn: 他打量着我，好像我刚刚吐在了他的牛仔裤上似的。

sentences.en: He was wearing blue jeans and checked shirt.
sentences.cn: 他穿着蓝色牛仔裤和格子衬衫。

sentences.en: He wore sandals and old jeans and his shirt-tails weren't tucked in.
sentences.cn: 他穿着凉鞋、旧仔裤，衬衫下摆也没塞进裤子里。

sentences.en: His mother looked ten years younger in jeans and flats.
sentences.cn: 他妈妈穿上牛仔裤和平跟鞋，看上去年轻了10岁。

sentences.en: I rigged myself out in thick jeans and heavy belt.
sentences.cn: 我穿上厚厚的牛仔裤，系上重重的皮带。

sentences.en: Leather jeans are the must-have fashion item of the season.
sentences.cn: 皮革牛仔裤是这一季必备的时尚服饰。

sentences.en: Leather jeans that are too big will make you look larger.
sentences.cn: 过于肥大的皮裤会让你看起来块头更大。

sentences.en: Levi Strauss says counterfeits of the company's jeans are flooding Europe.
sentences.cn: 利维·施特劳斯称仿冒其公司品牌的牛仔装正充斥着欧洲市场.

sentences.en: Nicole loves wearing her diamonds, even with jeans and a white T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 妮科尔很喜欢戴她的钻石首饰，即使穿的是牛仔裤和白色T恤衫。

sentences.en: She used to dress in jeans.
She wore jeans and a hoodie.
sentences.cn: 她穿着牛仔裤和连帽衫。

sentences.en: The button on his jeans went POP.
sentences.cn: 他牛仔服上的纽扣发出“啪”的响声。

sentences.en: There is a strict dress code: no trainers or jeans.
sentences.cn: 有严格的着装规定：不许穿运动鞋和牛仔裤。

sentences.en: Your jeans are in the wash.
sentences.cn: 你的牛仔裤还在洗着呢。

phrases.tran_cn: 牛仔裤；蓝色斜纹布裤子

trans.tran_en: trousers made of denim(= a strong, usually blue, cotton cloth )
